entry.title: Shri Ramakrishna Sankshipta Jivani Tatha Upadesh
Shri Ramakrishna Jaisa Hamne Unhe Dekha
Shri Saradadevi Sankshipta Jivani Tatha Upadesh
Dhyan (Ramakrishna Sangha Ke Sanyasiyon Ka Vivechan)
Anandadham Ki Ore - (Dharma Prasanga Main Swami Shivananda)
Adhyatma Marga Pradip (Swa. Turyanandaji Ke Vartalap)
Sadhakon Ke Nam Patra (Swami Turyananda Ke Patron Ka Sankalan)
Shriramnam Sankirtanam (Anuvad Va Hanuman Chalisa Sahit)
Matri Bhumi Ke Prati Hamara Kartavya
Prabuddha Nagarikata Aur Hamara Lokatantrik Rastra
Parivartanashil Samaj Ke Liye Shashwat Mulya
Paramlakshaki Prapti Hetu Katipaya Disha Nirdesh
Manasik Tanav Se Mukti Ke Upaya
Shanti Aur Dhanyata Ka Divya Path
Vyavaharik Vedant Ke Alok Main Loktantrik Prashasan
Adhunik Bharat Ke Nirma Me Shikshakon Ka Kartavya
Man Ki Shaktiyan Tatha Jivan-Gathan Ki Sadhanayen
Shri Ramakrishna, Shri Ma aur Swami Vivekananda Ki Saral Jivani
Amachi Mukhya Samasya Ani Srk-Vive. /Itar Lekha
Adhunik Bhartachi Ubharni va Shikshkanchi Bhumika
Swami Vivekananda Vyakti Ek: Pailu Anek
Swami Vivekananda Yanchya Mulakhati Va Prashnattor
Manawache Khare Swarup Ani Vividha Bhashane
Vedanta Ha Bhavijagacha Dharma Ahe Ka ?
